tasks.content: Backend software development for the promotion of new features of the online system trhough APIs.
Generation of current logistics reports and comparative charts displayed on dashboards.
Management and production of on-premise servers - Ubuntu 18.
Technologies: NestJs, TypeScript, ReactJs, Docker, NodeJs, JavaScript, MySQL, MongoDB, Java.

description.title: An Ecommerce
description.info: A very intuitive ecommerce where you can simulate to buying sneakers, add to cart based on the stock and remove the product from there if you want to.

description.title: Cryptocoins quoter
description.info: A Frontend app where anyone can quote their favorite cryptocoin based on some local coins such as USD, Euro, Peruvian Sol, etc.

projects.title: Aula 365
projects.stack: Angular, Material UI, Django Rest, Docker, GCP
projects.info: A simple basic crud , where comunicate backend and frontend for course registrations

projects.title: Expenses App
projects.info: The API includes the registration of a basic purchase(items with products, supplier). Each registration generates stock variations

projects.title: MiniTienda
projects.info: Quick product creation project in django with list view with pages and details view per product

projects.title: Detector-Enteldocs
projects.info: Generation of a tool that allowed us detect signature sections in manual reports using OpenCV to  a trained convolutional neural network(Yolo)

projects.title: volume variation using mediapipe
projects.info: Python script that allows you to control the computer volume using gestures
